_

_connWait - Variable in class com.xensource.xenapi.Connection
Deprecated.
This field is not used any more. To set the connection timeout for xml-rpc calls, please use the appropriate Connection constructor.
_public - Variable in class com.xensource.xenapi.Blob.Record
True if the blob is publicly accessible First published in XenServer 6.1.
_replyWait - Variable in class com.xensource.xenapi.Connection
Deprecated.
This field is not used any more. To set the reply timeout for xml-rpc calls, please use the appropriate Connection constructor.
